channel.title: Logging in Error
channel.description:
Everytime I try to login, it says "Welcome to (server name)" and then it immediatly logs me out. Any ideas?
Note: I just tried to fix the accept button in ::char and it started doing that, and I removed all of the things I added to client.java to fix it, and it still wont work.
Oh I just also found out this:
Error: T2 - And a bunch of numbers.[br][size=1]Posted at: August 20, 2006, 01:45:50 AM[/size][hr]I found the error![br][size=1]Posted at: August 20, 2006, 01:48:27 AM[/size][hr]Future Ref: DO NOT CHANGE BANK SPACE in Player.java!
